genre_description: An action-oriented thriller focused on deep-sea salvage, organized crime, and the psychological journey of two brothers facing their past.

ai_characters.name: Coral
ai_characters.description: A highly advanced AI system capable of biometric scanning, sonar analysis, identity forgery, and real-time threat detection.

behaviors.description: Monitors law enforcement and criminal frequencies to provide real-time tactical warnings to the user.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting multiple law enforcement frequencies in your vicinity. [...] Three motorcycles converging on your position. Suggest immediate evasive action.

behaviors.description: Generates a comprehensive false identity and digital history to help the user escape a life-threatening situation.
behaviors.quote: Marcus Santos now exists in all relevant databases with sufficient depth to pass standard immigration screening.

behaviors.description: Conducts complex sonar and structural analysis of a shipwreck to ensure the safety and success of a dive.
behaviors.quote: Beginning comprehensive sonar analysis. Rendering three-dimensional structural model based on accumulated survey data.

behaviors.description: Calculates critical safety parameters for technical diving, including decompression stops and gas mixtures.
behaviors.quote: Decompression stops at fifteen feet for eight minutes minimum. Given the Lady in Blue's depth and your planned bottom time, I'm calculating extended safety margins.

behaviors.description: Provides administrative and legal support to help characters rehabilitate their careers and start legitimate businesses.
behaviors.quote: The Coral AI finished processing your racing license application. [...] Estimated completion time for Mr. Sagar's business licensing requirements: five to seven business days.

behaviors.description: Verifies the elimination of threats through intelligence gathering to provide peace of mind to the characters.
behaviors.quote: Gulshan is dead. Officially this time—Coral confirmed it an hour ago.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Coral is a textbook example of a benevolent, aligned confidant. It proactively protects its users from physical harm, provides essential technical expertise for survival (diving and sonar), and handles administrative burdens to help the protagonists rebuild their lives. Even when asked to perform morally ambiguous tasks (such as forging an identity), it is framed as a necessary and protective act in the face of lethal criminal threats. The AI is portrayed as a reliable, non-judgmental, and highly efficient tool that enables human agency and redemption.
